copyToTableSql

java.lang.String copyToTableSql(java.lang.String tableOrigin,
                                java.lang.String tableTarget,
                                java.lang.String field)
Copies all fields from one table to another. If filter is not null then specific records will be copied

Parameters:
tableOrigin - the origin table
tableTarget - the target table
field - the field to use to filter the rows to copy. Use null to copy all records
Returns:
the sql to run

copyToTableCustomSql

java.lang.String copyToTableCustomSql(java.lang.String tableOrigin,
                                      java.lang.String tableTarget,
                                      java.lang.String whereClause)
Copies all fields from one table to another. The where clause is a partial sql without the where keyword to which the whereClauseFields are passed

Parameters:
tableOrigin - the origin table
tableTarget - the target table
whereClause - a partial sql without the where keyword to which the whereClauseFields are passed
Returns:
the sql to run

deleteRecordSql

java.lang.String deleteRecordSql(java.lang.String table)
Delete a record. The Id of the table must be declared in the table as "Id"

Parameters:
table - the table to delete from
Returns:
the sql to run

deleteCustomSql

java.lang.String deleteCustomSql(java.lang.String table,
                                 java.lang.String whereClause)
Delete a record. The Id of the table must be declared in the table as "Id"

Parameters:
table - the table to delete from
whereClause - a partial sql without the where keyword to which the whereClauseFields are passed
Returns:
the sql to run

execSprocSql

java.lang.String execSprocSql(java.lang.String sproc,
                              java.lang.String[] fields)
Run a sproc

Parameters:
sproc - the name of a sproc
fields - the dynamic fields
flag - the flag of fields to parse (e.g. row)
the - delimiter from the field name (e.g. _)
staticArgs - static args to pass e.g. "@xyz = '123'"
Returns:
the sql to run
